llm_text:
Why: The model flag is driven primarily by payment_format_ach = 1 (SHAP +2.97939), indicating an ACH payment strongly increased the alert score. payment_currency_saudi_riyal = 1 (SHAP +0.773463) and receiving_currency_saudi_riyal = 1 (SHAP +0.277276) further increased the score, reflecting the payment and receipt in Saudi riyal. amount_received = 66965.3 (SHAP +0.311218) contributed positively, indicating the transaction size raised the score. from_bank = 48526 (SHAP -0.500126) acted in the opposite direction and reduced the score.

Conclusion: The transaction was flagged mainly because it is an ACH payment (payment_format_ach) in Saudi riyals (payment_currency_saudi_riyal and receiving_currency_saudi_riyal) with a materially positive amount (amount_received). The sending bank (from_bank) modestly reduced the model score. If one is assessing priority, the ACH format and SAR currency combined with the noted amount are the primary drivers to review.
